name: cloud-rolodex
description: ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-blue.svg) ## Description  Cloud Rolodex is an interactive, express.js, sequelize and mySql-driven application that captures user input in the form of company rolodex data stored on a backend server. The rolodex items are each assigned a unique ID, and may be edited and deleted by logged in users at the push of a button.
